```{r load corpus, include=FALSE}
l_star_h_types = c("L*H", "^[L*]H", "L*^[H]", "^[L*H]")

# Load Corpus
m_corpus <- get_m_corpus("../data/m_corpus.csv")  %>%
  # Consolidate nuc_contour based on observation and types of register shift.
  mutate(
    nuc_contour =
      if_else(
        nuc_contour == "^[L*H %]" | nuc_contour == "^[L*H L%]",
        "^[L*H] %",
        if_else(nuc_contour == "L*^[H L%]", "L*^[H] %", nuc_contour)
      ),
    acc_phon =
      factor(
        str_replace(nuc_contour,
                    "\\s%$|\\sL%$",
                    ""),
        levels = c("H*", "L*H", ">H*", "^[L*]H", "L*^[H]", "^[L*H]")
      ),
    fin_phon = str_replace_all(fin_phon, "L%]|%]", "%"),
    fin_phon = factor(fin_phon, levels=unique(fin_phon))
  ) %>%
  # Select only columns for analysis
  select(
    speaker,
    gender,
    mode,
    prompt,
    acc_phon,
    fin_phon,
    h_f0) %>% 
  filter(acc_phon %in% l_star_h_types)  %>% 
  mutate(acc_phon = factor(acc_phon,
                           levels = l_star_h_types)
         )
```

```{r run initial model,  fig.height=3, fig.width=9,eval=FALSE, tidy = TRUE}

# run model
h_f0_model <-
  lmer(h_f0 ~ mode * acc_phon + fin_phon +(1 | gender) +
         (1 + acc_phon + mode | speaker) + (1 | prompt),
       data = m_corpus,
        control = lmerControl(
          optimizer = "optimx",
          calc.derivs = FALSE,
          optCtrl = list(
            method = "nlminb",
            starttests = FALSE,
            kkt = FALSE
          )
        )
      )

summariseLME(h_f0_model, run_step=TRUE)
```

-   Convergence and singularity issues.
-   Trying model suggested by step() .

```{r run step() model,  fig.height=3, fig.width=9, eval=FALSE, tidy = TRUE}

h_f0_model_reduced <-

           (1 + acc_phon + mode | speaker),
        data = m_corpus,
        control = lmerControl(
            optimizer = "optimx",
            calc.derivs = FALSE,
            optCtrl = list(
                method = "nlminb",
                starttests = FALSE,

        )

summariseLME(h_f0_model_reduced , run_step = TRUE)

```
-   convergence and singularity issues remain.
-   Running intercepts only model, 
-   This model works.

#### `h_f0 ~ mode * acc_phon + fin_phon +(1 | gender) + (1 | speaker)`
```{r run intercepts only model,  fig.height=3, fig.width=9, tidy = TRUE}

h_f0_model_reduced <-
    lmer(h_f0 ~ mode * acc_phon + fin_phon + gender + (1 | speaker),
        data = m_corpus,
        control = lmerControl(
            optimizer = "optimx",
            calc.derivs = FALSE,
            optCtrl = list(
                method = "nlminb",
                starttests = FALSE,
                kkt = FALSE
            )
        )
    )

summariseLME(h_f0_model_reduced , run_step = TRUE,
              write="../output_model_anovas/Mode_PA_h_f0_anova.csv")

```

```{r make tidy model, fig.height=3, fig.width=9, tidy = TRUE}

h_f0_model.tidy <- analyseModel(h_f0_model_reduced,
                                write_r2="../output/Mode_PA_h_f0"
                                )
h_f0_model.tidy$r2

```
